mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.selectItemSerch] - KR JIN */ SELECT STK_ID , STK_CODE , STK_DESC , UOM , DECODE(SERIAL_CHK, 'Y', 'Y', 'N') AS SERIAL_CHK , STK_TYPE_ID FROM SYS0026M WHERE STK_CODE = #{stockCode}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.selectHPScanInfoCheck] - KR JIN */ SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.SERIAL_NO ORDER BY A.SCAN_NO DESC ) AS RN , A.SCAN_NO , A.SCAN_STUS_CODE , A.REQST_NO -- GR NO , A.REQST_NO_ITM -- GR SEQ , A.DELVRY_NO , A.DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.FROM_LOC_ID , A.TO_LOC_ID -- TO CDC , A.TRNSC_TYPE -- (HP) , A.IO_TYPE FROM LOG0099D A WHERE A.SERIAL_NO = #{barcode} ) X WHERE X.RN = 1
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.saveSerialMaster] - KR JIN */ MERGE INTO LOG0100M A USING(SELECT #{barcode} AS SERIAL_NO , #{toLocCode} AS LAST_LOC_ID , #{stockCode} AS ITM_CODE , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , #{stkGrad} AS LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , NULL AS LAST_CUST_ID , NULL AS LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , #{ioType} AS STUS_CODE , #{docNo} AS LAST_REQST_NO , #{docNoItm} AS LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , NULL AS LAST_DELVRY_NO , NULL AS LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , NULL AS TEMP_SCAN_NO , #{crtUserId} AS CRT_USER_ID , SYSDATE AS CRT_DT , #{updUserId} AS UPD_USER_ID , SYSDATE AS UPD_DT FROM DUAL) B ON(A.SERIAL_NO = B.SERIAL_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.LAST_LOC_ID = B.LAST_LOC_ID , A.ITM_CODE = B.ITM_CODE , A.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT = B.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , A.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD = B.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , A.LAST_CUST_ID = B.LAST_CUST_ID , A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID = B.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , A.STUS_CODE = B.STUS_CODE , A.LAST_REQST_NO = B.LAST_REQST_NO , A.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM = B.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO = B.LAST_DELVRY_NO , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM = B.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.TEMP_SCAN_NO = B.TEMP_SCAN_NO , A.UPD_USER_ID = B.UPD_USER_ID , A.UPD_DT = B.UPD_DT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(A.SERIAL_NO , A.LAST_LOC_ID , A.ITM_CODE , A.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , A.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , A.LAST_CUST_ID , A.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , A.STUS_CODE , A.LAST_REQST_NO , A.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO , A.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.TEMP_SCAN_NO , A.CRT_USER_ID , A.CRT_DT , A.UPD_USER_ID , A.UPD_DT )VALUES( B.SERIAL_NO , B.LAST_LOC_ID , B.ITM_CODE , B.LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT , B.LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD , B.LAST_CUST_ID , B.LAST_SALES_ORD_ID , B.STUS_CODE , B.LAST_REQST_NO , B.LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , B.LAST_DELVRY_NO , B.LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM , B.TEMP_SCAN_NO , B.CRT_USER_ID , B.CRT_DT , B.UPD_USER_ID , B.UPD_DT )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.insertSerialMasterHistory] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO LOG0101H --Serial Numbers Info Master History ( SERIAL_NO --serial number , SEQ --seq , LAST_LOC_ID --Last location id , ITM_CODE --Material code , LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT --Last Delivery GR Date , LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD --Stock Grade , LAST_CUST_ID --customerid , LAST_SALES_ORD_ID --SalesOrderID , STUS_CODE --Status Code , LAST_REQST_NO , LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , LAST_DELVRY_NO --delivery , LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM --delivery item , TEMP_SCAN_NO --temp mapping scan number , CRT_USER_ID --name of person who created the object , CRT_DT --date on which record was created , UPD_USER_ID --update User id , UPD_DT --update date )VALUES( #{barcode} --serial number , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 AS SEQ FROM LOG0101H WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{barcode}) , #{toLocCode} --Last location id , #{stockCode} --Material code , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #{stkGrad} , NULL , NULL , #{ioType} , #{docNo} , #{docNoItm} , NULL , NULL , NULL , #{crtUserId} , SYSDATE , #{updUserId} , SYSDATE )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.copySerialMasterHistory] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO LOG0101H --Serial Numbers Info Master History ( SERIAL_NO --serial number , SEQ --seq , LAST_LOC_ID --Last location id , ITM_CODE --Material code , LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT --Last Delivery GR Date , LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD --Stock Grade , LAST_CUST_ID --customerid , LAST_SALES_ORD_ID --SalesOrderID , STUS_CODE --Status Code , LAST_REQST_NO , LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , LAST_DELVRY_NO --delivery , LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM --delivery item , TEMP_SCAN_NO --temp mapping scan number , CRT_USER_ID --name of person who created the object , CRT_DT --date on which record was created , UPD_USER_ID --update User id , UPD_DT --update date ) SELECT SERIAL_NO --serial number , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 AS SEQ FROM LOG0101H WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{boxno}) , LAST_LOC_ID --Last location id , ITM_CODE --Material code , LAST_DELVRY_GR_DT --Last Delivery GR Date , LAST_LOC_STK_GRAD --Stock Grade , LAST_CUST_ID --customerid , LAST_SALES_ORD_ID --SalesOrderID , STUS_CODE --Status Code , LAST_REQST_NO , LAST_REQST_NO_ITM , LAST_DELVRY_NO --delivery , LAST_DELVRY_NO_ITM --delivery item , TEMP_SCAN_NO --temp mapping scan number , CRT_USER_ID --name of person who created the object , SYSDATE , UPD_USER_ID --update User id , SYSDATE FROM LOG0100M WHERE SERIAL_NO = #{boxno}
mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.selectHPIngSerialInfo] - KR JIN */ SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.SERIAL_NO ORDER BY A.SCAN_NO DESC ) AS RN , A.SERIAL_NO , A.SCAN_NO , A.SCAN_STUS_CODE , A.REQST_NO -- GR NO , A.REQST_NO_ITM -- GR SEQ , A.DELVRY_NO , A.DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.FROM_LOC_ID , A.TO_LOC_ID -- TO CDC , A.TRNSC_TYPE -- (HP) , A.IO_TYPE FROM LOG0099D A ) X WHERE X.RN = 1 AND X.REQST_NO = #{reqstNo}
/* Added to select by pass-able column checking for serial scanning. By Hui Ding 15-06-2020 */ SELECT CODE FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND = #{ind} AND DISB = #{disb}
/* Added to select all serial number by box number. By HLTANG 09-11-2021 */ SELECT SERIAL_NO FROM LOG0062M WHERE BOX_NO = #{boxno}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.serialmgmt.SerialMgmtNewMapper.selectSerialInfo] - HLTANG */ SELECT X.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY A.SERIAL_NO ORDER BY A.SCAN_NO DESC ) AS RN , A.SERIAL_NO , A.SCAN_NO , A.ITM_CODE , A.SCAN_STUS_CODE , A.REQST_NO -- GR NO , A.REQST_NO_ITM -- GR SEQ , NVL(A.DELVRY_NO,'') DELVRY_NO , A.DELVRY_NO_ITM , A.FROM_LOC_ID , A.TO_LOC_ID -- TO CDC , A.TRNSC_TYPE -- (HP) , A.IO_TYPE FROM LOG0099D A ) X WHERE X.RN = 1 AND (X.DELVRY_NO = #{reqstNo} or X.REQST_NO = #{reqstNo})
and X.IO_TYPE = #{zIoType}
